title: Quick sesame tofu and pak choi stir-fry
description: A low-calorie vegan stir-fry recipe, made with tofu, bamboo shoots and pak choi, thatâ€™s ready in just 10 minutes. If you want to add meat, try using thinly-sliced minute steak.
ingredients: 2 pak choi, leaves separated and halved if large

method.Step 1: Heat 1 tbsp toasted sesame seed oil in a wok or large, deep frying pan over a high heat and fry the tofu for 4 minutes, until golden. Remove from the pan and set aside.

method.Step 2: Add another 1 tbsp sesame oil to the wok with the crunchy stir-fry vegetables, pak choi and bamboo shoots. Stir-fry for 5 minutes.

method.Step 3: In a bowl, mix 1 tbsp sesame oil with the dark soy sauce, sesame seeds and a good squeeze of lime. Stir into the wok with the tofu, warm through and serve with lime wedges to squeeze over.
